short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create interactive assignments for your Google Classroom courses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to create interactive and drag-drop type assignments for your Google Classroom courses. It does this by integrating our Iiraab app into Google Classroom.
